hof.core.utils

Class ColorList

  • java.lang.Object
    • hof.core.utils.ColorList

  • public class ColorList
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores for the player available Colors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorList()
      Creates, fills and shuffles all lists.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color getNextColor()
      Returns the next available color from the list.
      void reuseColor(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
      Refills the given color in the list.
      void reuseColors()
      Refills all colors in the list.

        Creates, fills and shuffles all lists.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextColor

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color getNextColor()
        Returns the next available color from the list. If there is none pink is returned.
        Returns:
        the next available color

      • reuseColor

        public void reuseColor(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color)
        Refills the given color in the list.
        Parameters:
        color - - the color to refill

      • reuseColors

        public void reuseColors()
        Refills all colors in the list. Has to be called when the player-list is cleared.
